snippet: Gunmen, believed to belong to a powerful gang called the New Generation Jalisco Cartel, ambushed a Jalisco State police convoy in one of the deadliest attacks on security forces in eight years of the drug war.
abstract: Gunmen attack Jalisco State police convoy as it traveled toward Guadalajara, Mexico, killing 15 officers; assailants are believed to be members of New Generation Jalisco Cartel, powerful drug gang whose leader was killed by security forces in March.
lead_paragraph: Gunmen, believed to belong to a powerful gang called the New Generation Jalisco Cartel, ambushed a Jalisco State police convoy in one of the deadliest attacks on security forces in eight years of the drug war.

headline.print_headline: The Americas; Mexico: Gunmen Kill 15 Police Officers
